sense.def:
To streamline a vehicle or object
pomeni izboljšati obliko vozila ali predmeta, da se premika hitreje in učinkoviteje.

seg.quote: Their new cars have lighter and more streamlined bodywork.

sense.def:
To streamline an organization or process
pomeni narediti neko organizacijo ali proces učinkovitejši tako, da iz njega odstranimo določene dele.

seg.quote: He aimed to streamline the Post Office.
